list_definition.definition: a struggle, competition etc to gain an advantage or victory
to take part in a competition or election and attempt to win it

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Five candidates are contesting the by-election.

list_definition.definition: to state formally that you do not accept something because you disagree with it or think that it is wrong

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: His wife is planning to contest the will.
